name: testChangeBudgetByFixedAmount
description: TC_06.002.02 Validate Change Budget to Fixed Amount Every Period
descriptionHtml: TC_06.002.02 Validate Change Budget to Fixed Amount Every Period

testStage.description: TC_06.002.02 Validate Change Budget to Fixed Amount Every Period

steps.name: Click on 'Pencil' icon next to the budget name
In the 'Auto-budget' selector, select 'Set a fixed amount every period'
Enter new valid numbers into the 'Auto-budget amount' field
To the right of the budget name there is a calendar icon, when you hover over it, it the following text appears: This budget will be set periodically

labels.name: story
labels.value: US_06.002 Set Periodic Budgeting with Fixed Amounts
